Binary: libadios-dev, libadios-openmpi-dev, libadios-mpich-dev, libadios-examples, libadios-bin, python3-adios
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-python3, dh-fortran-mod (>= 0.32), mpi-default-dev, libnetcdf-dev, libnetcdf-mpi-dev (>= 4.6.1-3), libmxml-dev, libopenmpi-dev [alpha amd64 arm64 ia64 kfreebsd-amd64 mips64el ppc64 ppc64el riscv64 s390x sparc64], openmpi-bin [alpha amd64 arm64 ia64 kfreebsd-amd64 mips64el ppc64 ppc64el riscv64 s390x sparc64], libmpich-dev, mpich, liblz4-dev, libblosc-dev, pkg-config, cmake, libbz2-dev, zlib1g-dev, libibverbs-dev [!hurd-i386 !kfreebsd-i386 !kfreebsd-amd64], python3-all-dev, python3-mpi4py, python3-numpy, cython3-legacy, libglib2.0-dev, libhdf5-dev, libhdf5-mpich-dev, libhdf5-openmpi-dev, libaec-dev
Package-List: libadios-bin deb science optional arch=any libadios-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libadios-examples deb science optional arch=all libadios-mpich-dev deb libdevel optional arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,armel,armhf,hppa,hurd-i386,i386,ia64,kfreebsd-amd64,kfreebsd-i386,m68k,mips,mips64el,mipsel,powerpc,powerpcspe,ppc64,ppc64el,riscv64,s390x,sh4,sparc64,x32 libadios-openmpi-dev deb libdevel optional arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,ia64,kfreebsd-amd64,mips64el,ppc64,ppc64el,riscv64,s390x,sparc64 python3-adios deb python optional arch=any
